arts.ttl: Real Madrid 2-1 Mallorca: Los Blancos Maintain Perfect Start To La Liga Season
arts.sum: Turkish star Arda Guler and Brazilian dynamo Vinicius Junior scored the goals on the night, whilst mercurial Frenchman Kylian Mbappe saw two efforts disallowed for offside offenses, and Guler saw another ruled out for a handball. Real Madrid put in a convincing display against Real Mallorca as they ran out 2-1 winners in their second game at the Santiago Bernabeu stadium this season.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 2-1 Mallorca (30 de Ago., 2025) Resultado Final

arts.ttl: Real Madrid maintain perfect LaLiga start with comeback win over Real Mallorca
arts.sum: Vedat Muriqi gave the visitors a shock 18th-minute lead at the Bernabeu, but Arda Guler and Vinicius Junior struck a minute apart to seal the victory.

arts.ttl: Alexander-Arnold Redeems Himself: Takeaways From Real Madrid’s 2–1 Win Over Mallorca
arts.sum: The England international responded to recent criticism with a clinical performance at both ends of the pitch against Mallorca.

arts.ttl: Vinicius, Guler star as title hopefuls Real Madrid secure vital win over Mallorca
arts.sum: Real Madrid come from behind to record a 2-1 victory over Mallorca in La Liga on Saturday night.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid Player Ratings vs. Mallorca: Vinicius Junior Bags Brilliant Winner in 2–1 Win
arts.sum: Los Blancos came from behind for the first time this season to record their third La Liga win of the 2025–26 campaign.

arts.ttl: ‘He’s back’ – Real Madrid fans hail one player during Mallorca clash
arts.sum: Fans of La Liga giants Real Madrid have on Saturday revealed their collective delight with the form of a leading member of the club’s attacking ranks. The player in question?…

arts.ttl: Fans React as Real Madrid Lead at Halftime After Conceding First Against Mallorca
arts.sum: However, two goals in two minutes gave Los Blancos a deserved lead at half-time. It was Mallorca forward Vedat Muriqi who headed the away team in front after Kylian Mbappe had a goal ruled out for offside.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Mallorca: Confirmed Starting Lineup Announced for La Liga Clash
arts.sum: Vinicius Jr, Trent Alexander-Arnold, Eder Militao, and Brahim Diaz all dropped to the bench for the Real Oviedo game, with Antonio Rudiger, Dani Carvajal, Rodrygo, and Franco Mastantuono all coming in. Trent Alexander-Arnold returns to the back four, as does Eder Militao, who partners with Dean Huijsen, who appears to be Alonso's preferred center-back.

arts.ttl: Why is Jude Bellingham not playing today for Real Madrid against Mallorca in LaLiga?
arts.sum: However, against Mallorca, Real Madrid will be without Jude Bellingham . In addition to Real Madrid’s game, Bellingham is also expected to miss the entirety of England’s fixtures across the September and October international breaks.
